title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may see people in your inner circle in a renewed, thought-provoking light today. In fact, you can gain a greater understanding of what motivates others as the intriguing Scorpio New Moon stalks through your 8th House of Transformation. Your perceptions of an individual changes when you stop viewing their interests through the filter of your preferences rather than theirs. Move beyond your assumptions; ask and listen to every word they say. Psychologist Heinz Kohut wrote, Empathy is the capacity to think and feel oneself into the inner life of another person. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
